span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 打败，征服： to defeat in a conflict or contest
【例】 vanquished his inner fear 战胜了他内心的恐惧
【近】 conquer, dominate, overpower, pacify, subdue, subject, subjugate, subordinate
【反】 capitulate, succor, surrender, yield 头像，屈服

【记】 victor 胜利者；van 货车，先锋 + quash 镇压，开着战车战胜
【另】 quench 结束，熄灭
